argumentText:
ARGUMENT
w

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | islnm.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` M ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( w = M -> ( LSubSp ` w ) = ( LSubSp ` M ) ) |
| 3 | 2, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( w = M -> ( LSubSp ` w ) = S ) |
| 4 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( w = M -> ( w |`s i ) = ( M |`s i ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( w = M -> ( ( w |`s i ) e. LFinGen <-> ( M |`s i ) e. LFinGen ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_raleqbidv | |- ( w = M -> ( A. i e. ( LSubSp ` w ) ( w |`s i ) e. LFinGen <-> A. i e. S ( M |`s i ) e. LFinGen ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_df-lnm | |- LNoeM = { w e. LMod | A. i e. ( LSubSp ` w ) ( w |`s i ) e. LFinGen } |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( M e. LNoeM <-> ( M e. LMod /\ A. i e. S ( M |`s i ) e. LFinGen ) ) |
